sense.def:
To wonder about something
pomeni razmišljati o nečem in o tistem poskušati kaj uganiti ali tisto bolje razumeti.

seg.quote: I keep wondering and worrying about what you said.
I wonder what she'll look like.
I am beginning to wonder why we ever invited them.

sense.def:
To wonder at something
pomeni biti presenečen in osupel ob nečem.

Kadar rečemo, da je nekaj, kar se je zgodilo,
a wonder
, hočemo povedati, da je zelo presenetljivo.

seg.quote: It was a wonder that she managed to come.

sense.def:
Wonder
je občutek presenečenja in osuplosti.

A wonder
je nekaj osupljivega, kar ljudje občudujejo.

Z izrazi
no wonder
,
little wonder
ali
small wonder
povemo, da nas nekaj ne preseneča.

seg.quote: Little wonder that today we are in such a mess.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
works wonders
ali
does wonders
, ima zelo dober učinek.

seg.quote: A whisky at the end of the day will sometimes work wonders.
The doctors have done wonders for your leg.
